name: Where is Paradise?
storyline:
Where is paradise is a multiplayer impostor game, the objective is to find the door to paradise, but beware! Demons will be there to get you lost in the dungeon. In order to find the door to paradise you will have to find the clues and expose the demons hidden in your team.

You will have to complete this last test in order to finally be able to access paradise. You and your team have been transported to a dungeon divided by room, and one of the rooms provides access to paradise. It's up to you to find it. But beware in your team there are demons who will be there to lead you in boats.

Each time you enter a new room, a team leader is randomly designated. The team leader has the option of casting a vote to choose a door through. The door with the most votes opens (the vote can also be canceled if the team decides to cancel the vote).

The team leader also has the possibility to launch an expedition.

An expedition allows to send several person in different room. When a player is sent to explore in a room, he has the capacity (only at that moment) to see the number of rooms that he must cross to reach the room of paradise.

It is the group leader who chooses which player will explore in which room, but this is put to the vote of the team. If the shipment is refused by the team, another team leader is randomly assigned.
summary: Where is paradise is an impostor multiplayer game, fun game between 4-11 players, the objective is to find the door to paradise! But Demons will be there to get you lost in the dungeon, in order to find the door to paradise you will have to find the clues and expose the demons hidden in your team.
